alert.note: Alert for Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 1:59PM EDT until August 10 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 1258 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near De Funiak Springs, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Oakwood Hills, Douglass Crossroad, Alpine Heights, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Glendale, Eucheeanna, Pleasant Hill, Pleasant Ridge, Center Ridge, Knox Hill, Piney Grove, Argyle and Mossy Head. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
